thread.section_title: The Darlington Hyde Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean and Comfortable
thread.title_full: Clean and Comfortable - Review of The Darlington Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Susan R
title: Clean and Comfortable
text:
We had a charming room at the Darlington Hyde Park hotel. The double bed was comfortable, just a tad cramped for two middle-aged humans, but cozy. The bathroom was bright and cheery with a huge window and a claw foot tub. Every convenience was available from a small safe, desk to work at, and a decent t.v. The full English breakfast that was included in the hotel price was amazing with scrambled eggs, baked beans, sausages, tomatoes, toast, coffee, and fruit. This was by far the best deal around as far as price, amenities included, clean atmosphere, and very friendly staff! The Paddington Train Station was within walking distance of the hotel. Best vacation in London yet!
Room Tip: Ask for a room that faces the main entrance street. See more room tips
